Description: Complete user registration and authentication system including signup, login, email verification, password reset, and session management. This epic covers all authentication-related functionality for the User Profile Management Module.
Complete profile management system including viewing, editing, avatar upload, skills management, and profile visibility controls. Users can fully manage their profile information.
User account settings and preferences including password change, notification preferences, privacy settings, account deletion, and two-factor authentication setup.
Security implementation including rate limiting, input validation, SQL injection prevention, XSS prevention, and CSRF protection across all user profile endpoints.
Frontend UI/UX implementation including responsive design, dark/light theme support, accessibility (WCAG 2.1), and loading states for all profile components.
Comprehensive testing including unit tests, integration tests, end-to-end tests, and performance tests for all User Profile Management features.
